trans-unit.source: Use the `UidManager` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `UidManager` elemento no ficheiro de projeto para criar e executar esta tarefa.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [UidManager](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para informações de utilização e o parâmetro, consulte [UidManager](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task executed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tarefa foi executada com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory that is used to back up the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files that are specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o diretório que é utilizado para criar cópias de segurança da origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ficheiros que são especificados a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles*>propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles*>

trans-unit.source: The directory that is used to back up the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files that are specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles*> property.
trans-unit.target: O diretório que é utilizado para criar cópias de segurança da origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ficheiros que são especificados a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles*>propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files to include for UID checking, updating, or removing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ficheiros a incluir para UID a verificação, atualizar ou remover.

trans-unit.source: The source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files to include for UID checking, updating, or removing.
trans-unit.target: A origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ficheiros a incluir para UID a verificação, atualizar ou remover.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the UID management task that you want to perform.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a tarefa de gestão de UID que pretende efetuar.

trans-unit.source: The UID management task that you want to perform.
trans-unit.target: A tarefa de gestão de UID que pretende efetuar.
